summary: A follower named Alexa Daeres who is of the Ningheim Race and can be married.
descriptionHtml:
[url=https://flic.kr/p/gpwdSR][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7447/10111527605_b200268aba_n.jpg[/img][/url]
This mod adds Alexa Daeres into the world of Skyrim. She is a follower of the Ningheim race, she is essential and you can also marry her.

She will level alongside the player and she favours the bow. She has got her glassbow that she inherited after her father died. (Yes this is a failed attempt at a beginning for a backstory for miss Alexa)

She also should not set off traps while you are sneaking.

Her default clothes are FineClothes01 (the blue and white ones, with the fur) and her armour (that you can take away from her) is the Studded armour.


[url=https://flic.kr/p/gpGERW][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3682/10113566136_188cda3336_m.jpg[/img][/url]
There are two version to chose from:
Alexa Daeres: She will wait for you in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun
Alexa Daeres Alternative: You will find her in the Moorside Inn in Morthal.
Choose only one.


[url=https://flic.kr/p/gpvWAG][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5451/10111472844_cf74c41e5a_m.jpg[/img][/url]
She will be waiting for you somewhere inside The Bannered Mare in Whiterun or Moorside Inn in Morthal, depending on which version you downloaded.


[url=https://flic.kr/p/gpwEMV][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7296/10111614783_94d4ee0d87_m.jpg[/img][/url]
Skyrim version 1.9.32.0.8 or higher
The Ningheim Race and its requirements: SKSE, RaceCompatibility, Ningheim Brows package (although it works fine without SKSE).


[url=https://flic.kr/p/gpwdSv][img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2863/10111527585_0962f91ff1_m.jpg[/img][/url]
Download and install with NMM or manually download and unpack the file to a location of your choice, and then copy the "Data" map into your Skyrim directory.


[url=https://flic.kr/p/gpwdRD][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3725/10111527535_58515422ee_m.jpg[/img][/url]
Uninstall with NMM or manually by deleting these files:
AlexaDaeres.esp
000012C4.dds
00000D62.tga
000012C4.nif

In the following locations:
Skyrim/Data/AlexaDaeres.esp
Skyrim/Data/textures/actors/Character/FaceGenData/FaceTint/AlexaDaeres.esp00012C4.dds
SkyrimDatatexturesactorsCharacter/FaceGenData/FaceTint/AlexaDaeres.esp0000D62.tga
Skyrim/Data/Meshes/actors/Character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/AlexaDaeres.esp00012C4.nif


[url=https://flic.kr/p/gpy3DP][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5499/10111883433_3e00c74c8e_m.jpg[/img][/url]
I think she will have the CBBE body since I have the CBBE version of Ningheim installed on my computer, but I'm not certain.

Also, this is my first mod and I almost don't have any knowledge at all about how to make mods an so on, so I might not be able to provide support should there be any issues, although I will try my best of course. :)


[url=https://flic.kr/p/gpwdTc][img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2840/10111527625_cbb2f97a11_m.jpg[/img][/url]
Cred goes out to:
Seren4XX, HelloSanta, Urshi and co for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35474//?]The Ningheim Race[/url]
Seren4XX for being very helpful through PM's and for writing the helpful article "How to create your own Custom Race follower(s) - Tutorial based on The Ningheim"
TMPhoenix for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility[/url]
author: ninaaou2
